mapper.sql: id, plan_id, play_category_id, lottery_type, dict_amount_model, order_no, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, number, source_number, amount, double_count, win_amount, win_count, status, execute_index, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from yjcycc_lottery.bs_order where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_order(plan_id, play_category_id, lottery_type, dict_amount_model, order_no, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, number, source_number, amount, double_count, win_amount, win_count, status, execute_index, create_time, update_time) values (#{planId}, #{playCategoryId}, #{lotteryType}, #{dictAmountModel}, #{orderNo}, #{stage}, #{stageDate}, #{stageNum}, #{stageIndex}, #{number}, #{sourceNumber}, #{amount}, #{doubleCount}, #{winAmount}, #{winCount}, #{status}, #{executeIndex}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_order
plan_id = #{planId},
play_category_id = #{playCategoryId},
lottery_type = #{lotteryType},
dict_amount_model = #{dictAmountModel},
order_no = #{orderNo},
stage = #{stage},

amount = #{amount},
double_count = #{doubleCount},
win_amount = #{winAmount},
win_count = #{winCount},

execute_index = #{executeIndex},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_order where id in (${ids})
